definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Low tire pressure could be the cause; check pressure first.
sentences.chinese: 偏向可能是輪胎內壓的原因，應先查胎壓。

sentences.english: Check your tires weekly to make sure they're properly inflated.
sentences.chinese: 每個禮拜檢查輪胎，並確認胎壓是否適當。

sentences.english: TPMS was implemented a number of years ago, but only on high-end luxury vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 胎壓監測系統實施前的數年，但只有在高端豪華車。

sentences.english: On the basis of the use of the environment and conditions of the tire pressure monitoring system.
sentences.chinese: 通過對胎壓監測系統的使用環境和條件的基礎上。

sentences.english: "Pressure is as important as grip, " explains Prosser.
Tire Valve, Wheel Balancing Weights, Digital Tire Gauges, Tire Pressure Monitoring System.
sentences.chinese: 氣門嘴，氣壓計，胎壓檢測系統。
